description: A simple cylindrical connector with a 20mm diameter body, 40mm length, and two M5 threaded holes on opposite sides for securing screws.
code:
import cadquery as cq

result = (
    cq.Workplane("XY")
    .circle(10)
    .extrude(40)
    .faces(">X")
    .workplane(centerOption="CenterOfMass")
    .hole(5, depth=10)
    .faces("<X")
    .workplane(centerOption="CenterOfMass")
    .hole(5, depth=10)
)
prompt: A simple cylindrical connector with a 20mm diameter body, 40mm length, and two M5 threaded holes on opposite sides for securing screws.
